thread.title: The Daredevil Sneak Peek Gives Us a Glimpse at Elektra and Punisher
thread.title_full: The Daredevil Sneak Peek Gives Us a Glimpse at Elektra and Punisher | Maxim

author: Sean Abrams
title: The Daredevil Sneak Peek Gives Us a Glimpse at Elektra and Punisher
text:
If you weren't one of the lucky few to get lost in the Javits Center this weekend at New York Comic Con, you missed out on some pretty exciting stuff: a blast from the past All That reunion, busty beauties decked out in comic book costumes , and an inside-look at some of the hottest shows coming out next year. One of 'em, and quite possibly the most important, is Netflix's Daredevil .
Since season 2 won't be bestowed upon us until 2016 rolls around, use this time to re-watch the newest teaser footage on repeat over, and over...and over again. The new bits, which reveal even more dark and gritty times in store for Matt Murdock and crew, also features some new additions to the killer cast.
Who might this be in the silky red ninja garb? Sub-out Jennifer Garner for professionally-trained martial artist Elodie Yung and you've got a new take on the elusive Elektra .
The Punisher lurks his way into Hell's Kitchen in the upcoming episodes, and to be honest, just the back of his head is intimidating. We'd let Frank Castle crush our skull any day.
Daredevil hits Netflix in 2016.
Daredevil season 2 trailer pic.twitter.com/tyM8yOx4ds
